Minimizes the appearance of pores for a soft, smooth and radiant complexion^Light cream with aloe, green tea antioxidants and refining humectants lightly replenishs nutrients and moisture^100% vegetarian ingredients^No animal testing^NO: parabens, phthalates, or synthetic fragrances
body.description: Say a'glow'ha to vibrant, seemingly poreless skin. These tropical facial cocktails mix aloe vera, exotic fruit enzymes and pore-refining Hawaiian extracts to cleanse, tone and moisturize so skin is soft, smooth and radiant. Discover pure island beauty. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Refining Aloe & Green Tea Hawaiian Oil-Free Moisturizer Alba Botanica Refining Aloe & Green Tea Hawaiian Oil-Free Moisturizer minimizes the appearance of pores while lightly hydrating the skin for a soft, radiant complexion. Antioxidant green tea, gotu kola, cucumber and aloe nourish skin and infuse it with extra moisture, leaving it with a silky-smooth feeling. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or harsh sulfates. It is also not tested on animals.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients, even if the animal isn’t killed. *see ingredients list Paraben Free We believe in making environmentally conscious decisions about what we use inside and outside our products. Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are also made with sustainably sourced paper stock.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated tomaking high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Hawaiian Kukui Nut Body Oil Hawaiian Cocoa Butter Hand & Body Lotion Hawaiian Jasmine & Vitamin E Moisture Cream Hawaiian Coconut Water Ultra Sheer Lotion More Body Care Products from Alba Botanica Kukui nut, high in essential fatty acids and nutrients, works to soften and nurture your skin. This lotion nourishes and pampers dry skin with cocoa butter and shea butter combined with a blend of jojoba, macadamia, flax and sunflower oils. Nourishing jojoba, kukui nut and sweet almond oils provide intense hydration, while papaya, jasmine and vitamin E soothe and revitalize skin. Rice starch absorbs excess oil to give the complexion a matte finish, while nourishing coconut water tones and hydrates, leaving you with powdery soft skin and clean pores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best oil free lotion
reviews.reviewText: This is just the best. Doesn't leave your skin feeling oily and gross. Also doesn't have a ton of fragrance added.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Facial Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This is the best moisturizer I've tried and I'm a big skin person. First, I'm more into the natural-ingredient products than the products with more chemical ingredients (i.e., Ponds). Second, I have combination skin, whichis acne prone. Moisturizer is a huge conundrum for me because oils in your pores can cause acne, and of course a moisturizer--while it may soften your skin--can cause blocked pores, which in turn causes acne. Here's what I've tried:1. Derma E Tea Tree Oil and Vitamin E Moisturizer: You can tell the tea tree oil is a prominent ingredient because the smel is so strong, but this produt is too oily. My face looks oily after se--especially my forehead, and it feels oily.2. Desert Essence Oil Free moisturizer: so "oil-free" that after use, you feel like you never used anything at all. My face, in fact, felt as dry as it did before application.3. Raw Aloe Vera Plant: I buy the plant stem from a local store, cut it into pieces and squeeze the juice on my face at night. I figured why buy products with watered down aloe when I can apply aloe directly on my skin? Well, the smell is horrible and it's really gooey. It does dry but when you wash it off the next morning, you have to wash extra hard just to get the goo off. A lot of time and energy.4. Alba Botaica Sea Kelp Night Creme: good, but heavier and you feel like you're wearing a cream on your faceNOW FOR THE PRODUCT OF THE HOUR: Alba oil free moisturizerExcellent. The product is silky smooth. After you put it on, your face feels moisturized, but if you run you index finger all around your face, you can't feel the moisturizer. So, at night, it doesn't get on my pillow--like the other moisturizers--while still getting the job done. My skin also looks good, but it doesn't make your skin look oily. It just looks "non-dry".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cream!
reviews.reviewText: Not greasy and it doesn't leave a film. This sent is light and nice. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Goes on smooth with no greasy residue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, works just as advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for men, too...
reviews.reviewText: I noticed there were no reviews from guys, which is unfortunate. We men are stupidly told to use harsh soaps and alcohol-based aftershave...or be too effeminate. A college friend insisted I try her lotion. Within a week of of use, my face was clearer, less oily, and had less redness. My skin was much less angry about my attempts to stupidly dry it out!This works great for me with my dry skin but somewhat oily nose - the Alba is not oily but easily absorped and soothing (Some said it doesn't absorp?! I have to put normal lotion on my hands first or my hands soak all of this up!). I used cheap Nivea for men for a while, which is a bit greasy, and the expensive Art of Shaving process, which was alright. I have sensitive skin and thick facial hair so after shaving I needed something calming. I shave with Avalon Organic's lavender stuff, and I use this to calm any leftover discomfort. It doesn't smell a lot, which I like since people often smell like a chemical factory and when I rarely use cologne this doesn't interfere.Ultimately, everyone's skin is different, but this is a fine pick for men, too. I took off one star because we men don't get why abundant things like aloe and green tea cost so much. Parents, girlfriends, and wives should encourage boys and men to try some lotion. This is a great product to recommend.2016 Update--I was buying as I have for 10 years and am surprised this review was here. I still love it, despite all the new brands for men. I've tried Lather's light moisturizer (too insubstantial and expensive), some Jack Black and Every Man Jack oil and non-oil based creams (all pricy and a bit heavy), gf's $80 creams (with gold I guess), etc. The only changes I've made are that I shave with Jack Black's triple comfort stuff--the best I've ever tried for my N. European skin with Sicilian hair (also tried EOS, which was good); I use often use a light sunscreen over this (Olay SPF15 or Alba's Very Emollient SPF30 when I bike, but I personally see little difference in non-oil sunscreens); and I sheepishly admit that, for sunny vacations, I use Dr. Gross alpha beta pads to tan so I'm not tempted to zap myself! I've convinced several friends, including one with psoriasis, to try this, and most have liked it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Different Packaging But Same Great Product!
reviews.reviewText: The packaging and jar are different than the original Alba Botanica Hawaiian Moisturizer and the picture shown, but it's still the same product! I ordered the 2 pack, but only photographed one. They came quickly, wrapped together. No leaks, etc. during shipping. I've used this moisturizer for years; I've tried other products but nothing else compares. Its oil free, so it doesn't leave my face oily or greasy, it smells nice, and it's light weight compared to other moisturizers. I have very sensitive skin and it has never made me break out. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Moisturizing Oil for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: It is difficult to find a moisturizer without perfumes that actually helps one's skin. This fits the bill. It is non scented, so I add a drop or two of an essential oil to this natural product by Alba and it is just perfect for my skin. I have been using it for quite a few years and it is all I use on my face. I am 63 years old with great skin! I get compliments due to my lack of wrinkles. This product helps!

I've never used this before. I usually purchase Avalon Vitamin C facial moisturizer, but now since I've tried, Alba Botanical Aloe & Green Tea Moisturizer, had no skin sensitivity, which is usually a problem for me. I love it. I will definitely purchase more in the future.
I love this product as it feels so nice when to put it on.No strong smell!
Great very moisturizing but felt oily when applied.
